author: USA TODAY, Mary Nahorniak, USA TODAY
title: 'Grateful that we have this option': Some pregnant women turn to home births amid coronavirus pandemic
description: Some pregnant women say home births feel safer and offer more control during the coronavirus pandemic.
content:
The coronavirus is disrupting pregnancy plans and raising anxiety for expectant mothers. Doctors say more study is needed to know the effects of the virus on a fetus and baby. (March 31)
AP Domestic
